aboutPage.title: About GoGoHockey
aboutPage.intro: GoGoHockey is Ottawa's hockey hub — we help players find games, book ice time, and connect with local clubs. Our mission is to make hockey accessible for everyone.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.intro: Have questions or feedback about GoGoHockey? We'd love to hear from you.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: GoGoHockey ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
privacyPage.collectBody: We collect information you provide directly, such as when you register, book a rink, or post a game. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and other profile details.
privacyPage.useBody: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process bookings, send notifications, and communicate with you about the Ottawa youth hockey community.
privacyPage.contactBody: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please visit our Contact page.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.intro: Welcome to GoGoHockey. By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service.
termsPage.useBody: You agree to use GoGoHockey only for lawful purposes related to connecting Ottawa's youth hockey community. You are responsible for the accuracy of information you provide.
termsPage.bookingsBody: Bookings made through our platform are subject to the policies of the respective ice rinks. Platform fees may apply as disclosed at the time of booking.
termsPage.contactBody: For questions about these Terms, please visit our Contact page.
